name: ECOLLAPSE 2030: the world is ending and also you are a penguin
name_original: ECOLLAPSE 2030: the world is ending and also you are a penguin
description:
made for ludum dare 49

welcome to the end

you're a cool as cucumber penguin, and the world is ending. as everything burns and collapses around you, it's time to find your friends and enjoy one last sunset together.

controls

controller suggested!

wasd/left thumbstick - move
space/a button (xbox)/x button (ds4) - jump
left shift/right trigger - dive

known issues

there is no volume slider because i forgot they were a thing. to turn the volume down, try only wearing half a headphone.
